Half Lobster & Shrimp Pasta. </26> <27> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>SPECIALTY DISHES SEAFOOD BOIL CRAB COMBO 1450 ZAR 14 Prawns 14 Mussels 14 Calamari 2 Lobster Tails and Full Crab Portion Served with sweetcorn, baby potatoes and cocktail sausage or boiled eggs. </27> <28> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>SPECIALTY DISHES SPOILMYLADY FEAST 580 ZAR 4 Prawns, 2 Lobster Tails Half Crab Portion, musells and calamari, Shrimp, Squid heads served on a bed of rice with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </28> <29> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>SPECIALTY DISHES THE GREAT ONE 400 ZAR 3 Lobster Tails, 6 Prawns, Mussels or Calamari Served with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </29> <30> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>SPECIALTY DISHES CRAB THIEVE 500 ZAR 1 Full Crab Portion, 6 Prawns, 2 Lobster Tails Served with sweetcorn, baby potatoes and cocktail sausage. </30> <31> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>MONEY MISERS PRAWN & LOBSTER DELIGHT 230 ZAR 3 Prawns, 4 Mussels or 4 Calamari, 1 Lobster Tail Served with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </31> <32> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>MONEY MISERS CRAB & PRAWN DELIGHT 250 ZAR 3 Prawns, Half a Crab Portion, 1 Lobster Tail Served with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </32> <33> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>MONEY MISERS CRAB & PRAWN INDULGE 320 ZAR 3 Prawns, Half a Crab Portion, Shrimp, 1 Lobster Tail Served with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </33> <34> Lobster Tavern Food SEAFOOD>MONEY MISERS CRAB & PRAWN AFFAIR 350 ZAR 4 Prawns, Half a Crab Portion, Shrimp, 2 Lobster Tails Served with sweetcorn and baby potatoes. </34>
